View.SQL: select * from DIM_EDARE where (id>=100 and office_type!='9') or ID=5 or ID=23 order by ORDINAL_OSTAN asc,ORDINAL_SHAHRESTAN asc,ORDINAL_EDARE asc
select * from DIM_EDARE_KHAREJI where (id>=100 and office_type!='9') or ID=5 or ID=23 order by ORDINAL_OSTAN asc,ORDINAL_SHAHRESTAN asc,ORDINAL_EDARE asc
select * from DIM_GROHSENI order by id
select * from DIM_GROHSENIFOT order by id
select * from DIM_TAHSILAT order by sort,id

select OSTAN,F_OSTAN,SHAHRESTAN,F_SHAHRESTAN,GEO,ID ,OSTAN_ORDINAL_FOREIGN,SHAHRESTAN_ORDINAL,GEO_ORDINAL from DIM_GEO where (f_shahrestan is not null) or (f_noemahal = 3 and id!=90019) order by OSTAN_ORDINAL_FOREIGN asc,SHAHRESTAN_ORDINAL asc,GEO_ORDINAL asc

select OSTAN,F_OSTAN,SHAHRESTAN,F_SHAHRESTAN ,case f_noemahal when 6 then BAKHSH else GEO end GEO ,case f_noemahal when 6 then F_BAKHSH else ID end ID ,OSTAN_ORDINAL_FOREIGN,SHAHRESTAN_ORDINAL ,case f_noemahal when 6 then BAKHSH_ORDINAL else GEO_ORDINAL end GEO_ORDINAL from DIM_GEO where (f_shahrestan is not null) or (f_noemahal = 3 and id!=90019) order by OSTAN_ORDINAL_FOREIGN asc,SHAHRESTAN_ORDINAL asc,GEO_ORDINAL asc
select n.*,g.F_OSTAN,g.OSTAN,g.F_SHAHRESTAN,SHAHRESTAN from dim_notary n left join dim_geo g on g.id=n.f_geo order by OSTAN_ORDINAL asc,SHAHRESTAN_ORDINAL asc,GEO_ORDINAL asc,NOTARY asc
select f.*,case g.f_noemahal when 1 then g.id else g.f_bakhsh end as f_geo_birth_shahrbakhsh from FACT_TAVALOD f left join DIM_GEO g on g.id=f.F_GEO_BIRTH where CONTROL_FLAG!=5

select f.*,case g.f_noemahal when 1 then g.id else g.f_bakhsh end as f_geo_death_shahrbakhsh ,case when SEN_SAAL is null then -1 when SEN_SAAL>=100 then 100 else SEN_SAAL end F_SENFOT from FACT_FOT f left join DIM_GEO g on g.id=f.F_GEO_DEATH

select f.* ,case gm.f_noemahal when 1 then gm.id else gm.f_bakhsh end as F_GEO_MARRIAGE_shahrbakhsh ,case gh.f_noemahal when 1 then gh.id else gh.f_bakhsh end as F_GEO_HUSBAND_shahrbakhsh ,case gw.f_noemahal when 1 then gw.id else gw.f_bakhsh end as F_GEO_WIFE_shahrbakhsh from FACT_EZDEVAJ f left join DIM_GEO gm on gm.id=f.F_GEO_MARRIAGE left join DIM_GEO gh on gh.id=f.F_GEO_HUSBAND left join DIM_GEO gw on gw.id=f.F_GEO_WIFE where f.F_MARRIAGE_NATIONALITY_TYPE=1

select f.* ,case gm.f_noemahal when 1 then gm.id else gm.f_bakhsh end as F_GEO_DIVORCE_shahrbakhsh ,case gh.f_noemahal when 1 then gh.id else gh.f_bakhsh end as F_GEO_HUSBAND_shahrbakhsh ,case gw.f_noemahal when 1 then gw.id else gw.f_bakhsh end as F_GEO_WIFE_shahrbakhsh from FACT_TALAGH f left join DIM_GEO gm on gm.id=f.F_GEO_DIVORCE left join DIM_GEO gh on gh.id=f.F_GEO_HUSBAND left join DIM_GEO gw on gw.id=f.F_GEO_WIFE where f.F_MARRIAGE_NATIONALITY_TYPE=1

select f.* ,case gm.f_noemahal when 1 then gm.id else gm.f_bakhsh end as F_GEO_MARRIAGE_shahrbakhsh ,case gh.f_noemahal when 1 then gh.id else gh.f_bakhsh end as F_GEO_HUSBAND_shahrbakhsh ,case gw.f_noemahal when 1 then gw.id else gw.f_bakhsh end as F_GEO_WIFE_shahrbakhsh from FACT_EZDEVAJ f left join DIM_GEO gm on gm.id=f.F_GEO_MARRIAGE left join DIM_GEO gh on gh.id=f.F_GEO_HUSBAND left join DIM_GEO gw on gw.id=f.F_GEO_WIFE

select f.* ,case gm.f_noemahal when 1 then gm.id else gm.f_bakhsh end as F_GEO_DIVORCE_shahrbakhsh ,case gh.f_noemahal when 1 then gh.id else gh.f_bakhsh end as F_GEO_HUSBAND_shahrbakhsh ,case gw.f_noemahal when 1 then gw.id else gw.f_bakhsh end as F_GEO_WIFE_shahrbakhsh from FACT_TALAGH f left join DIM_GEO gm on gm.id=f.F_GEO_DIVORCE left join DIM_GEO gh on gh.id=f.F_GEO_HUSBAND left join DIM_GEO gw on gw.id=f.F_GEO_WIFE
